name: Yveltal BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Baleful Night
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Yveltal BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
